name: Frostnight's Glow
description: A chunk taken from the horned crown of a defeated Frostnight Scion.  In the oldest sagas of the Frostmoon Scions, the glow of these noble creatureswas described as the "unsullied mercy of the divine emissary" by thephilosophers of the far north. Though this mercy could not prevent the fall ofthe Golden City or save her descendants from exile, the same glow stillcourses through their horned crowns, waiting for a dream that may neverreturn.
